title: Designing a Mobile Learning (M-Learning) Application: Development of a Language Education Program Based on an Integrated Instructional Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic software development knowledge (UI/UX, application development processes) and understanding of language learning theories
context.additional_context: Digital devices (tablets, smartphones) provided, with offline workshops and online practice conducted in parallel. Emphasizes an integrated approach to language learning content design.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the entire process from requirements analysis to deployment of mobile learning applications.
Learners can integrate instructional design models and software architecture for M-Learning applications in language learning.
Learners can apply UI/UX design principles for M-Learning prototypes optimized for blended learning environments.
Learners can continuously improve educational effectiveness and technical completeness of applications through formative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
